items.sentence: Tom told me that he'd wait for me until I came back.
We all chipped in to buy a birthday present for Tom.
I do try not to come here more often than I have to.
What did you do with the books that were on my desk?
What I want is for you to get along with my brother.
What I want is for you to properly apologize to Tom.
If I had more money, I would move to a bigger house.
When times are hard, you learn who your friends are.
If you leave the window open, the rain will come in.
I really have no idea what I'm supposed to be doing.
